title: Sofa (England), 18th century
medium: mahogany; upholstered in brown tight weave silk.
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Hepplewhite-style sofa. Three back legs and four front legs. Front legs square tapered and fluted, with spade feet. Curved back, continuing to sloping arms. Central palmette at cneter of back, above husk garlands in channeled flute. Small padded arms on side slops, with husk garland beneath, terminating in stop-fluted knee above outer pair of legs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sofa (England), 18th century. mahogany; upholstered in brown tight weave silk.. 
Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1926-22-345-a,b.
